name: British Adhesives & Sealants Association
goal: Representing the adhesive and sealant manufacturing industry and its associated suppliers in UK & Ireland. Approximately 100 members.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Consumers, Environment, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
